summary: Almighty Dawnbreaker and Almighty Ebony Blade were just simple tweaks I did for The Walking Draugr by Kozuke Hajime. The weapons are enchanted with the same enchantment of the Regretful Shiv but they dont break or disappear after one use. Made a patch and sharing it to those who might be interested. Only use this if you have The Walking Draugr mod.
descriptionHtml:
[size=6]The Walking Draugr Almighty Weapons 

[/size][size=4]Almighty Dawnbreaker & Almighty Ebony Blade were just simple tweaks I did for The Walking Draugr by Kozuke Hajime. The weapons are enchanted with the same enchantment of the "Regretful Shiv" but they don't break or disappear after one use. I made it for the sole purpose of making a video demo more fast-paced because the "Regretful Shiv" was too tedious to use. In any case, I made a patch for it & sharing it to those who might be interested. Only use this if you have "The Walking Draugr" mod. Load the patch under it. 

REQUIRED (Credits as well): The Walking Draugr by Kozuke Hajime 
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/77433/

Weapons are craftable & temperable at any forge, under Misc. Ebony Smithing Perk required. 



[youtube]OvJQDW2kAUU[/youtube][/size]
author: AerysTMD
